To play a paramedic. I didn’t book it. I probably can’t blame this shirt for that.  But I’m going to.  This shirt has caused potentially irreparable damage to my career, and I would not recommend it to anyone who needs to look like a young, attractive paramedic for a primetime network drama.  To be clear, the fit was perfect and I have no actual proof that this shirt is the reason I didn’t book that audition.  But it was.  I’m sure it’s great for wearing as an actual paramedic, or for other auditions for different shows or a movie about a paramedic or just with a paramedic in it.  But someone watching my tape must have thought “I hate this shirt and by extension the man wearing it.” Because I could have killed that role and everyone knows it.  4/5 stars.

I perform (drummer) in a musical marching group and it was time to purchase a replacement shirt I've had for over 10 years.  I chose the First Class Men's Long Sleeve Uniform Shirt.  The group uses chevrons, patches, etc. to be placed on the shirt.  The shirt was delivered within 36 hours of placing the order, so that was great!  Upon opening the package, the shirt was packaged neatly and folded in a plastic bag.  When I opened it all up, I was first pleased with the very sharply white color and the QUALITY polyester material. It looks like it will last for many years.  I also liked the very slight sheen to the material. Truly a sharp-looking white shirt. The buttons are also a nice size and WHITE, not the normal pearlesque of most shirt buttons. I think the white buttons add to the sharpness of the look.  I tried on the shirt, and it fit perfectly.  XXL  My wife will be putting the patches and insignia on the shirt soon.  I am very happy and pleased with the amazing low price and the excellent quality.  VERY HAPPY!  I can't wait to wear it for the upcoming July 4 parade and show it off!

This shirt exceeded my expectations in quality and comfort.  The fabric is soft without losing the firmness needed in a work shirt.  It has impeccable seams and the buttonholes are well worked. However this shirt has what it takes to work, comfort and quality.  My husband is a medium size and I ordered it myself and it fit him perfectly.  Now I know that I will be able to buy the remaining 4 to get through the week without any difficulties.  Highly recommended
